ruff_check.command: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/todo.py tests/test_issue_2000_json_validation.py tests/test_storage_atomicity.py

ruff_format.command: uv run ruff format --check src/flywheel/todo.py tests/test_issue_2000_json_validation.py tests/test_storage_atomicity.py

summary: All verification checks passed. The fix adds validation in from_dict to reject negative or zero IDs. A downstream test (test_concurrent_save_from_multiple_processes) was also updated to use positive IDs.
